A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The positive critical reception of this film demonstrates the control Disney has on media channels.  The film\, and characters in it\, accomplish nothing and the viewer is subsequently left with no payoff for the 152 minute investment.  This is the definition of wheel spinning\, where the irrelevant side stories distract from any legitimately interesting components of the franchise which are ultimately dismissed and ignored by the time of completion.
